p: The fresh young flowers of Bauhinia Variegata Linn were collected from Tehsil Kotli Sattian (District Rawalpindi) in the flowering period of March - April 2016. The flower samples were identified by experienced taxonomist Dr. Mushtaq Ahmad, Associate Professor in the Department of Plant sciences, Quaid-i- Azam University Islamabad Pakistan. The voucher specimen was maintained in the Herbarium of Pakistan (ISL) Department of Plant sciences, Quaid-i-Azam University for future reference (BV115).
